forgot_password.title: Forgot your password?
forgot_password.description: Don't fret! Just type in your e-mail and we will send you a code to reset your password!
forgot_password.success_msg: Password reset e-mail has been sent.

profile.title: Edit profile
profile.newsletter: Sending weekly reports with a comparison of prediction and actual prices

signup.subject: Registration confirmation
signup.thank_you: Thank you for signing up on our platform.
signup.success_done: Your registration has been successfully completed and your account has been activated.
signup.further_questions: If you have any further questions regarding the use of our services or need assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are here for you.

forgot_password.subject: Reset password
forgot_password.request_password: We have received a request to reset the password for your account.
forgot_password.new_password: A new password has been generated for your account.
forgot_password.contact_us: If you did not request a new password, please contact us immediately.
forgot_password.further_questions: If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to contact us.
